# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(input_str::String, max_line_length::Int = 10)
    words = split(input_str)
    lines = String[]
    line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(line * " " * word) > max_line_length
            push!(lines, line)
            line = ""
        end
        line *= " " * word
    end

    if !isempty(line)
        push!(lines, line)
    end
    
    return join(lines, '\n')
end

# Test the function
println(wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines", 15))
```
